original_text: In the third month they began to pile up the heaps, and finished them in the seventh month.
korean_text: 셋째 달에 그 더미들을 쌓기 시작하여 일곱째 달에 마친지라

sentences.original_text: In the third month they began to pile up the heaps
sentences.korean_translation: 세째 달에 그들은 무더기를 쌓기 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: and finished them in the seventh month
